name: Mercury Fallen (itch)
description:
Manage a group of colonists as they attempt to survive underground on an alien world. Automated machine construction was sent ahead to create the Mercury facility, but something has gone wrong and your colonists awake to find the facility in ruin. Expand the colony, build structures and recover technologies to ensure the survival of your new found home away from home.

Features
  • Grow clones and assemble robots to expand your facility population.
  • Manage colonists’ injuries, ailments, jobs, quirks and needs.
  • Grow various terrestrial and alien crops for material and meal production.
  • Uncover colonists, robots, story content, and discoveries hidden in collapsed sections of the Mercury Facility.
  • Build and manage power and water resources.
  • Customize your colonists name and outfit colors.
  • Research technology to unlock new structures, recipes, crops and more.
  • Take advantage of procedural generation, so that each new game is a new experience.

Mercury Fallen is being developed by Tim Pelham which is the entire team of Nitrous Butterfly. There is a lot of exciting things to come for Mercury Fallen and a huge thank you to those that join the adventure.
